definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
all thunder but no rain (idiom)/a lot of noise but no action
pinyin: gan1 da3 lei2 , bu4 xia4 yu3

sentences.english: You know it's gonna rain when you see big storm clouds rolling in!
sentences.chinese: 看着乌云飘过来，就知道快下雨了。

sentences.english: The sprinklers will remain off when it rains.
sentences.chinese: 下雨的时候，洒水器会自动关闭。

sentences.english: It rained yesterday after it had been dry for many months.
sentences.chinese: 在天旱了好几个月之后，昨天下雨了。

sentences.english: It will rain, for the barometer is falling.
sentences.chinese: 天将会下雨，因为气压表正在下降。

sentences.english: But he said you remember the week that rained?
sentences.chinese: 他却问我，你记得那个下雨的周末吗？

sentences.english: They wear galoshes in wet weather.
sentences.chinese: 他们在下雨天穿胶套鞋。

sentences.english: We didn't really expect it to start raining so at the first pit stop we kept the old tyres.
sentences.chinese: 我们没想到会下雨，所以在一停后没有换胎。

sentences.english: It's going to rain; We'd better get back to camp soon.
sentences.chinese: 要下雨了，我们最好快回到营地去。

sentences.english: Peacock also is said to be able to foretell rain, and dances when rain is coming.
sentences.chinese: 据说孔雀能够预知雨水，将要下雨的时候就会跳舞。

sentences.english: If it rains tomorrow, we won't have morning assembly.
sentences.chinese: 如果明天下雨我们就不上晨会。

sentences.english: I get finished with all my errands before it starts to rain.
sentences.chinese: 我真的希望能在下雨前将这些差事干完。

sentences.english: One day I was going to my auntie's home, mom told me to bring an umbrella in case it mined.
sentences.chinese: 一天我去姑姑家，妈妈叮嘱我带把伞以防下雨。

sentences.english: I seldom go by bus except when it is rainy.
sentences.chinese: 除了下雨的时分，我很少乘公同汽车。

sentences.english: I had not gone a mile when it began to rain.
sentences.chinese: 我连一英哩都还没有走到就开始下雨了。

sentences.english: Whether it rains or not, we’ll hold the sports meet.
sentences.chinese: 不管下不下雨，我们都将举行运动会。

sentences.english: The plants of courtyard appears to be more vigorous in hazy rain.
sentences.chinese: 院子的植物也因为下雨的关系，越发显得葱翠。

definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
to rumble with thunder/clap of thunder
to get wet in the rain
